body:
@parallel369 Japan allows it in drawn form (way less cultural taboos about sexualizing minors, sadly), and this site doesn't prohibit it. Many anthologies will have at least a few works involving it in every issue, and lately Mugen Tensei's been having it in nearly half the volume (much to my personal distaste).

You can steer clear by watching out for the "Loli" and "shota" tags, or better yet blacklisting them in your settings.
Oh my god, that Ikumo Taisuke bit is wonderful. Dumb brute of a gal just straight up forcing herself on an angry younger guy. Fantastic role reversal femdom.
do they allow child porngraphy? that's so sick
狡い約束 is my favorite

001 - karino hasumi (狩野ハスミ)
002 - ikumo taisuke (井雲泰助)
